tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_financing_instrument AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, v.category_value, COALESCE(v.id, -999999999) AS id, v.terms_assist_id, v.financing_instrument_id, v.donor_org_id, v.mode_of_payment_id, v.funding_status_id, v.agreement_id, v.funding_id FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.amp_activity_id, val.category_value, f.financing_instr_category_value AS id, f.type_of_assistance_category_va as terms_assist_id, f.financing_instr_category_value as financing_instrument_id, f.amp_donor_org_id as donor_org_id, f.mode_of_payment_category_va as mode_of_payment_id, f.funding_status_category_va as funding_status_id, f.agreement as agreement_id, f.amp_funding_id as funding_id FROM amp_funding f JOIN amp_category_value val ON f.financing_instr_category_value = val.id UNION SELECT eu.amp_activity_id, val.category_value, eu_con.financing_instr_category_value AS id, null::bigint as terms_assist_id, null::bigint as financing_instrument_id, null::bigint as donor_org_id, null::bigint as mode_of_payment_id, null::bigint as funding_status_id, null::bigint as agreement_id, null::bigint as funding_id FROM amp_eu_activity eu JOIN amp_eu_activity_contributions eu_con ON eu_con.eu_activity_id = eu.id JOIN amp_category_value val ON eu_con.financing_instr_category_value = val.id ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
